schema.description: 查询的设备品牌ID，和**DeviceBrand**不能同时为空。
查询的设备品牌名称，和**DeviceBrandId**不能同时为空。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "9c7a3b09-a69a-43f5-8bf2-84f7119810eb",
  "DeviceBrand": {
    "Manufacture": "Alibaba",
    "DeviceBrandId": 1,
    "Description": "天猫精灵品牌",
    "DeviceBrand": "天猫精灵",
    "ProjectId": "projectTest"
  }
}","errorExample":"{
  "Code":"NoPermissionToAccessProject",
  "HostId":"iovcc.cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com",
  "Message":"User is not authorized to access the specified project.",
  "RequestId":"6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064"
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeDeviceBrandResponse>
	<RequestId>E94C9864-56FB-44AD-AC0C-A1CEFB332254</RequestId>
	<DeviceBrand>
		<Description>天猫精灵品牌</Description>
		<DeviceBrand>天猫精灵</DeviceBrand>
		<DeviceBrandId>1</DeviceBrandId>
		<Manufacture>Alibaba</Manufacture>
		<ProjectId>projectTest</ProjectId>
	</DeviceBrand>
</DescribeDeviceBrandResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询获取设备品牌信息
summary: 根据品牌ID或品牌名称，查询获取设备品牌信息。
